isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Electric Window Regulator Assembly with Power Window Motor

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

Remove driver side inner door handle from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Remove Driver Side Inner Door Handle.

Remove driver side cab door grab handle from upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

If vehicle is so equipped, remove driver side electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel. Refer to
ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a small hammer or handle end of a screw driver and from back side of inner door panel (Item 4) tap two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) through inner door panel and remove upper door trim panel (Item 3) from front side of inner door panel (Item 6). Lay upper trim panel out of the way and save for reinstallation. This will allow access to mounting hardware securing electric window regulator assembly to inside of inner door panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 61 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Disconnect electric window regulator motor connector (Item 1) from electric window regulator motor (Item 2) on back side of inner door panel (Item 3).

Remove ten hex head mach. screws (Item 4) on front side of inner door panel (Item 5) securing electric window regulator assembly (Item 6) to back side of inner door panel (Item 3). Lay electric window regulator assembly out of the way and save for reinstallation if not being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 61. Driver Side Electric Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
4. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW, 1/4-28 UNF X 3/4
5. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Electric Window Regulator Assembly with Power Window Motor

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

Remove passenger side inner door handle from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Remove Passenger Side Inner Door Handle.

Remove passenger side cab door grab handle from upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

If vehicle is so equipped, remove passenger side electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel. Refer to
ELECTRIC WINDOW AND/OR ELECTRIC DOOR LOCK SWITCH ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side electric window and/or electric door lock switch assembly.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a small hammer or handle end of a screw driver and from back side of inner door panel (Item 4) tap two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) through inner door panel and remove upper door trim panel (Item 3) from front side of inner door panel (Item 6). Lay upper trim panel out of the way and save for reinstallation. This will allow access to mounting hardware securing electric window regulator assembly to inside of inner door panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 62 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Disconnect electric window regulator motor connector (Item 1) from electric window regulator motor (Item 2) on back side of inner door panel (Item 3).

Remove ten hex head mach. screws (Item 4) on front side of inner door panel (Item 5) securing electric window regulator assembly (Item 6) to back side of inner door panel (Item 3). Lay electric window regulator assembly out of the way and save for reinstallation if not being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 62. Passenger Side Electric Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
4. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW, 1/4-28 UNF X 3/4
5. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Manual Window Regulator Assembly

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from driver side cab door as follows.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Unscrew door lock knob (Item 1) from door lock control rod (Item 2) sticking through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 63 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Temporarily slide window regulator handle (Item 1) onto window regulator handle shaft (Item 2). Place a wood block (Item 3), 12.5 inches long, through opening in inner door panel (Item 4) and lower window down against wood block so two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) are accessible through oval opening in center of inner door panel. This will keep window up so it will not fall to the bottom of cab door and will prevent having to try and lift window back into position during installation.
Remove two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) securing window regulator assembly (Item 6) to window regulator bracket (Item 7) on the window.

figure.caption: Figure 63. Driver Side Window Regulator Assembly and Window Regulator Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREWS, 1/4-28 UNF x 3/4

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If so equipped, through electric door lock actuator access opening in inner door panel (Item 6). Slide retaining clip (Item 8) off electric door lock control rod from electric door lock actuator (Item 9) and remove it from electric door lock control rod (Item 10).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Squeeze together tabs on wiring harness push-in fasteners (Item 1) and push them through inner door panel (Item 2) to allow for upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) removal from cab door.

figure.caption: Figure 64. Driver Side Cab Door Wiring Harness on Inner Door Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 41 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove six pan head torx screws (Item 11) from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).
Lift driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) up over door lock control rod (Item 2).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 65 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door enough to disconnect two piece control rod (Item 2) from inner door handle (Item 3) to door latch assembly (Item 4). Slide retaining clip (Item 5) off inner door handle control rod (Item 6) and remove it from door latch inner door handle control rod (Item 7).

While holding driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door, disconnect cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 8) from cab door courtesy light switch.

figure.caption: Figure 65. Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
7. DOOR LATCH INNER DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
8. CAB DOOR COURTESY LIGHT SWITCH CONNECTOR

step1.para: Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

Remove driver side inner door handle from driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Remove Driver Side Inner Door Handle.

Remove driver side cab door grab handle from driver side upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 66 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is so equipped, remove electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) by removing two pan head mach. screws (Item 2), then disconnect electric door lock switch connector (Item 3) and remove electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel (Item 4). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 66. Driver Side Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. PAN HEAD MACH. SCREW, NO. 8-18 X 3/4

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 59 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a small hammer or handle end of a screw driver and from back side of inner door panel (Item 4) tap two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) through inner door panel and remove upper door trim panel (Item 3) from front side of inner door panel (Item 6). Lay upper trim panel out of the way and save for reinstallation. This will allow access to mounting hardware securing electric window regulator assembly to inside of inner door panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 67 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove six hex head mach. screws (Item 1) on front side of inner door panel (Item 2) securing manual window regulator assembly (Item 3) to back side of inner door panel (Item 4). Lay manual window regulator assembly out of the way and save for reinstallation if not being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 67. Driver Side Manual Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW, 1/4-28 UNF X 3/4
2. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
4. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Manual Window Regulator Assembly

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from passenger side cab door as follows.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Unscrew door lock knob (Item 1) from door lock control rod (Item 2) sticking through opening in upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 68 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Temporarily slide window regulator handle (Item 1) onto window regulator handle shaft (Item 2). Place a wood block (Item 3), 12.5 inches long, through opening in inner door panel (Item 4) and lower window down against wood block so two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) are accessible through oval opening in center of inner door panel. This will keep window up so it will not fall to the bottom of cab door and will prevent having to try and lift window back into position during installation.
Remove two hex head mach. screws (Item 5) securing window regulator assembly (Item 6) to window regulator bracket (Item 7) on the window.

figure.caption: Figure 68. Passenger Side Window Regulator Assembly and Window Regulator Bracket

calloutgroup.callout1: 5. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREWS, 1/4-28 UNF x 3/4

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If so equipped, through electric door lock actuator access opening in inner door panel (Item 6). Slide retaining clip (Item 8) off electric door lock control rod from electric door lock actuator (Item 9) and remove it from electric door lock control rod (Item 10).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 69 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Squeeze together tabs on wiring harness push-in fasteners (Item 1) and push them through inner door panel (Item 2) to allow for upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) removal from cab door.

figure.caption: Figure 69. Passenger Side Cab Door Wiring Harness on Inner Door Panel

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 49 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove six pan head torx screws (Item 11) from upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3).
Lift passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 3) up over door lock control rod (Item 2).

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 70 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Hold passenger side upper passenger side door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door enough to disconnect two piece control rod (Item 2) from inner door handle (Item 3) to door latch assembly (Item 4). Slide retaining clip (Item 5) off inner door handle control rod (Item 6) and remove it from door latch inner door handle control rod (Item 7).

While holding passenger side upper passenger side door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly (Item 1) away from cab door, disconnect cab door courtesy light switch connector (Item 8) from cab door courtesy light switch.

figure.caption: Figure 70. Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
7. DOOR LATCH INNER DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
8. CAB DOOR COURTESY LIGHT SWITCH CONNECTOR

step1.para: Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface.

Remove passenger side inner door handle from passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly. Refer to
INNER DOOR HANDLE
, Remove Passenger Side Inner Door Handle.

Remove passenger side cab door grab handle from passenger side upper door trim panel. Refer to
CAB DOOR GRAB HANDLE
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Grab Handle.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 71 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: If vehicle is so equipped, remove electric door lock switch assembly (Item 1) by removing two pan head mach. screws (Item 2), then disconnect electric door lock switch connector (Item 3) and remove electric door lock switch assembly from upper door trim panel (Item 4). Save for reinstallation.

figure.caption: Figure 71. Passenger Side Electric Door Lock Switch Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. PAN HEAD MACH. SCREW, NO. 8-18 X 3/4

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 60 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Use a small hammer or handle end of a screw driver and from back side of inner door panel (Item 4) tap two flat dome pine tree trim push-in fasteners (Item 5) through inner door panel and remove upper door trim panel (Item 3) from front side of inner door panel (Item 6). Lay upper trim panel out of the way and save for reinstallation. This will allow access to mounting hardware securing electric window regulator assembly to inside of inner door panel.

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 72 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove six hex head mach. screws (Item 1) on front side of inner door panel (Item 2) securing manual window regulator assembly (Item 3) to back side of inner door panel (Item 4). Lay manual window regulator assembly out of the way and save for reinstallation if not being replaced.

figure.caption: Figure 72. Passenger Side Manual Window Regulator Assembly

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX HEAD MACH. SCREW, 1/4-28 UNF X 3/4
2. FRONT SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
4. BACK SIDE OF INNER DOOR PANEL
